content:
# Commute ZA

## Plan Smarter Daily Trips
Commute ZA helps South African commuters compare practical travel options across buses, trains, taxis and e-hailing with clear journey context.

## What You Can Do Here
- Compare common transport modes in one place.
- Find nearby stations and ranks from your location.
- Explore route details before you leave.

## Why It Matters
Reliable route context reduces uncertainty, saves time and helps commuters make safer day-to-day travel decisions.
metaTitle: Journey Planner for South Africa | Commute ZA
metaDescription: Plan train, bus, taxi and e-hailing routes across South Africa with live journey options, practical timings and clear steps for daily commuting.

content:
# AI Planner

## Build a Trip Plan Around Your Day
Use plain language to describe where you need to go and what matters most, then get practical travel suggestions you can validate against live options.

## Best Inputs for Better Results
- Start point and destination.
- Preferred departure or arrival time.
- Priorities such as cost, speed or fewer transfers.

## Important Note
AI output is planning guidance. Always confirm final route details and service availability before travel.
metaTitle: AI Trip Planner for SA Journeys | Commute ZA
metaDescription: Create tailored journey ideas with AI using your travel preferences, then explore practical multimodal options for moving across South Africa.

content:
# Bus Stations Near You

## Find Nearby Bus Access Points
Discover nearby bus stations and stops with quick distance context, operator information and route support to help you decide faster.

## How to Use This Page
- Enable location to fetch nearby stations.
- Select a station to view route context.
- Compare estimated distance and travel practicality.

## Related Articles
This page can automatically show up to two latest articles tagged with "bus" from CMS.
metaTitle: Bus Stations Near You in SA | Commute ZA
metaDescription: Locate nearby bus stations in South Africa, compare options around your area and get practical route context before you set off.

content:
# Contact Commute ZA

## Need Help or Want to Collaborate?
Use our contact form to share support questions, feedback or partnership requests.

## Include These Details
- What you were trying to do.
- The route, page or feature involved.
- Screenshots or steps to reproduce (if relevant).

## Response Times
We aim to review messages quickly and respond with clear next steps.
metaTitle: Contact Commute ZA Support Team | Commute ZA
metaDescription: Contact Commute ZA for support, feedback or partnership queries, and share details so we can respond with helpful, relevant guidance.

content:
# Privacy Policy

## What We Collect
We may process information needed to provide route planning and support services, including technical usage data and submitted form details.

## How We Use Information
- Deliver and improve core product functionality.
- Respond to support requests and user feedback.
- Maintain platform security and reliability.

## Your Choices
You can contact us to request updates or clarification regarding your personal data.
metaTitle: Privacy Policy and Data Use | Commute ZA
metaDescription: Read how Commute ZA collects, uses and protects personal information, including your rights, choices and key data handling practices.

content:
# Taxi Ranks Near You

## Discover Nearby Minibus Taxi Access
Find nearby taxi ranks with location context to help you plan practical first-mile and last-mile travel.

## Using This Page
- Enable location to detect nearby ranks.
- Review rank details and surrounding transport options.
- Use route planning tools to combine taxi travel with other modes.

## Commuter Reminder
Confirm local queue conditions and route availability at the rank when possible.
metaTitle: Taxi Ranks Near You in South Africa | Commute ZA
metaDescription: Find nearby minibus taxi ranks in South Africa, view location details and use route context to choose a practical option for your trip.

content:
# Terms of Service

## Platform Use
By using Commute ZA, you agree to use the platform lawfully and responsibly for journey planning and related information services.

## Service Scope
Route outputs and travel context are provided on a best-effort basis and may change as third-party and local transport conditions change.

## Liability
Users remain responsible for final travel decisions and real-world safety checks before and during travel.
metaTitle: Terms of Service and Usage Rules | Commute ZA
metaDescription: Review Commute ZA terms covering platform usage, service availability, responsibilities and legal conditions for using our transport tools.

content:
# Train Stations Near You

## Locate Rail Access Points Quickly
Find nearby train stations and review route context to support everyday commuting and longer city connections.

## What You Can Check
- Nearby station proximity from your current location.
- Route context for onward travel planning.
- Multi-modal options that combine train with bus or taxi access.

## Practical Tip
For peak periods, allow extra time for station access and transfers.
metaTitle: Train Stations Near You in SA | Commute ZA
metaDescription: Find nearby train stations in South Africa, including key Metrorail and Gautrain stops, with simple route context to support your next journey.
